main.java.com.djrapitops.plan

Class Plan

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bukkit.plugin.PluginBase
      • org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPlugin
        • main.java.com.djrapitops.plan.Plan
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.bukkit.command.CommandExecutor, org.bukkit.command.TabCompleter, org.bukkit.command.TabExecutor, org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin

    public class Plan
extends org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPlugin
    Javaplugin class that contains methods for starting the plugin, logging to the Bukkit console and various get methods.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Rsl1122

    • Method Detail

      • onEnable

        public void onEnable()
        OnEnable method. Creates the config file. Checks for new version. Initializes Database. Hooks to Supported plugins. Initializes DataCaches. Registers Listeners. Registers Command /plan and initializes API. Enables Webserver and analysis tasks if enabled in config. Warns about possible mistakes made in config.
        Specified by:
        onEnable in interface org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin
        Overrides:
        onEnable in class org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPlugin

      • onDisable

        public void onDisable()
        Disables the plugin. Stops the webserver, cancels all tasks and saves cache to the database.
        Specified by:
        onDisable in interface org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin
        Overrides:
        onDisable in class org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPlugin

      • initDatabase

        public boolean initDatabase()
        Initializes the database according to settings in the config. If database connection can not be established plugin is disabled.
        Returns:
        true if init was successful, false if not.

      • getAnalysisCache

        public AnalysisCacheHandler getAnalysisCache()
        Used to access AnalysisCache.
        Returns:
        Current instance of the AnalysisCacheHandler

        public HookHandler getHookHandler()
        Used to access HookHandler.
        Returns:

      • getDatabases

        public HashSet<Database> getDatabases()
        Used to get all possible database objects. #init() might need to be called in order for the object to function.
        Returns:
        Set containing the SqLite and MySQL objects.

      • getBootAnalysisTaskID

        public int getBootAnalysisTaskID()
        Used to get the ID of the BootAnalysisTask, so that it can be disabled.
        Returns:
        ID of the bootAnalysisTask

      • getAPI

        @Deprecated
public API getAPI()
        Deprecated. Use Plan.getAPI() (static method) instead.
        Old method for getting the API.
        Returns:
        the Plan API.

      • getInstance

        public static Plan getInstance()
        Used to get the current instance of Plan. Instance is set on the first line of onEnable method.
        Returns:
        current instance of Plan, Singleton.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If onEnable method has not been called and the instance is null.

      • setInstance

        public static void setInstance(Plan plan)
        Used to set the current instance of Plan.
        Parameters:
        plan - The newly enabled Plan instance.

      • getPlanAPI

        public static API getPlanAPI()
                      throws IllegalStateException
        Used to get the PlanAPI. @see API
        Returns:
        API of the current instance of Plan.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If onEnable method has not been called on Plan and the instance is null.
